### parameters
A real-valued vector w of the same dimensionality as our input feature vector $X$ $(WX)$: $(\omega)^{(1)}(x)^{(1)} + (\omega)^{(2)}(x)^{(2)}+ (\omega)^{(3)}(x)^{(3)}+...+(\omega)^{(D)}(x)^{(D)}$  
$D$ is the number of dimensions of the feature vector $X$.
